committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on National Parks and Public Lands

official_title: To designate certain public lands in the State of Idaho as Craters of the Moon National Park and the Great Rift National Preserve.
short_title: Craters of the Moon National Park Act of 1989

summary.text: Craters of the Moon National Park Act of 1989 - Establishes the Craters of the Moon National Park and the Great Rift National Preserve in Idaho. Requires the Secretary of the Interior to prepare a management plan for the park and preserve. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: Craters of the Moon National Park Act of 1989
To designate certain public lands in the State of Idaho as Craters of the Moon National Park and the Great Rift National Preserve.
